content.rendered:
35% Off Melissa & Doug Products!

Now through February 27 get 35% OFF all in-store Melissa & Doug products!

Ladies’ Night Out

Mark your calendars for Middle Georgia’s 11th annual Ladies’ Night Out! This event benefits the pro-life adoption ministry Covenant Care Services.

The event will feature LaDonna Gatlin who is a performer, speaker, and author. Be encouraged as LaDonna teaches us how to “tune up” our lives!

You can pick up your tickets at any Gottwals Books location.

Learn how Covenant Care changes lives.

Upcoming Event: Author Signing on February 27

2016 Calendars

excerpt.rendered: Mark your calendars for Middle Georgia’s 11th annual Ladies’ Night Out! This event benefits the pro-life adoption ministry Covenant Care Services.
